description: Updates status for cost allocation tags in bulk, with maximum batch size of 20. If the tag status that's updated is the same as the existing tag status, the request doesn't fail. Instead, it doesn't have any effect on the tag status (for example, activating the active tag).

parameters.name: CostAllocationTagsStatus
parameters.description: The list of CostAllocationTagStatusEntry objects that are used to update cost allocation tags status for this request. (dict) --- The cost allocation tag status. The status of a key can either be active or inactive. TagKey (string) --- The key for the cost allocation tag. Status (string) --- The status of a cost allocation tag.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of UpdateCostAllocationTagsStatusError objects with error details about each cost allocation tag that can't be updated. If there's no failure, an empty array returns.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key for the cost allocation tag.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: An error code representing why the action failed on this entry.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message explaining why the action failed on this entry.
